title: Update rank level thresholds in Command Center / Dashboard

requirements.summary: Update rank progression thresholds in rankUtils.ts to implement the new level ranges for all nine ranks from E Rank Hunter through Shadow Monarch
acceptanceCriteria: A player at level 1 displays 'E Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 5 displays 'D Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 10 displays 'C Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 15 displays 'B Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 20 displays 'A Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 30 displays 'S Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 40 displays 'SS Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 50 displays 'SSS Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 60 or above displays 'Shadow Monarch'.
The RankBadge component on the Dashboard / Command Center page reflects the updated thresholds correctly.

file_operations.description: Update the getRankFromLevel function to use the new threshold values: E Rank Hunter (Lvl 1–5), D Rank Hunter (Lvl 5–10), C Rank Hunter (Lvl 10–15), B Rank Hunter (Lvl 15–20), A Rank Hunter (Lvl 20–30), S Rank Hunter (Lvl 30–40), SS Rank Hunter (Lvl 40–50), SSS Rank Hunter (Lvl 50–60), Shadow Monarch (Lvl 60+). Only modify the numeric level comparison logic; preserve all rank label text and color mappings exactly as they are.
